entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
